analysis.description:
IcoPhaseManagement.close (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#259-267) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#266-267)

TokenHolderSnapshotter.snapshotUpdate (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#636-688) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- existingBalance == _newBalance
	- existingBalance == 0

Reentrancy in IcoPhaseManagement.abandon (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#294-330):
	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#300-302)
	- numberTokenHolders = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#303)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoAbandoned (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#320)

Reentrancy in TokenHolderSnapshotter.snapshot (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#628-636):
	External calls:
	- allTokenHolders.length = siftContract.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#630-632)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allTokenHolders (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#633-634)

Reentrancy in TokenHolderSnapshotter.snapshot (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#628-636):

	- addr = siftContract.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#634)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allTokenHolders (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#634)

SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenOwnerAdd.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#520-521) shadows:

TokenHolderSnapshotter.snapshotUpdate.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#666-669) shadows:

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#308)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- etherToSend = paymentPerShare * smartInvestmentFundToken.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4dcc8e092fc1ad29d98b3c36c2460b3153d0b7ec.sol#309-312)

TokenHolderSnapshotter.snapshot has external calls inside a loop:
